modName: Dovahkiin General Store - A Player Home
summary: A general store player home located in Rorikstead with all the necessities
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a General Store home in Rorikstead.  It\'s got all sorts of items on display.  Perfect for anyone who wants to roleplay as a store owner or a shopkeeper\'s spouse.  If you have the Spouses Can Live Anywhere mod you can move your spouse in there and have them run the store instead of running it out of your Breezehome living room.

The house contains:

-Bedroom
-Kitchen with cooking spit
-2 Mannequins
-A Bookcase (holds 18 books)
-Weapon racks
-Alchemy workbench
-Enchanting table
-Chests for storage
-Full smithing workshop (smelter, forge, workbench, sharpening wheel, tanning rack)
-Stable with a horse

Installation
--------------
Drag and drop .esp file into your data folder

Uninstalling
---------------
Delete .esp file from your data folder

Incompatibilities
---------------------
Not compatible with Highland Milk Ranch because it occupies the same spot
author: SqueakyDoggy
